########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    double_vector_sink.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/mikes_oot
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-mikes_oot)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/mikes_oot/
)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_phase_tracker_pll ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_phase_tracker_pll.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_vector_to_stream_64bit ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_vector_to_stream_64bit.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_stream_to_vector_64bit ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_stream_to_vector_64bit.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_streams_to_vector_64bit ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_streams_to_vector_64bit.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_vector_to_streams_64bit ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_vector_to_streams_64bit.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pub_sink_64bit ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pub_sink_64bit.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_double_to_float_stream ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_double_to_float_stream.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_freq_counter_all_weights ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_freq_counter_all_weights.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_float_to_double_stream ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_float_to_double_stream.py)
